data.title: Bluedot: The most accurate AI notetaker for Google Meet
data.description: Record, transcribe and summarize your meetings with AI-generated notes. Automatically update your CRM, Notion, and more. Free Chrome extension.

A meeting recorder you’ll enjoy.  No bots needed.

Fast and intuitive, Bluedot makes meetings better.

It’s clickable. Try it out.

Here’s how Bluedot works:  

----------------------------

[### Step1: Record your meetings Easily record and transcribe your meetings with the Bluedot extension.](https://www.bluedothq.com/#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0)[### Step 2: Generate meeting notes Generate AI meeting notes adapted to your use case (customer calls, all-hands, etc.)](https://www.bluedothq.com/#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1)[### Step 3: Share meeting follow ups Automatically share your meeting notes to Slack, Notion or your favourite CRM.](https://www.bluedothq.com/#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2)

What makes Bluedot different?
-----------------------------

### Bot free meeting recorder

Non-intrusive way of recording Google Meet.

![Image 67: Bluedot no meeting notes](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ba882066506a1a593a0def/663a0e0aa3c2b759b1f0c226_Frame%2040454.png)

### Customisable meeting notes

Generate AI notes adopted to your needs.

![Image 68: Meeting notes templates](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ba882066506a1a593a0def/64d51011dc53b756433d6197_Frame%2040063.svg)![Image 69: Meeting notes](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ba882066506a1a593a0def/64df7db3731709d159a2d592_Frame%202449.webp)

### GDPR-first approach

All your data encrypted, protected and stored according to EU laws.

![Image 70: GDPR protected](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ba882066506a1a593a0def/64be49cd65ae112a88726589_ccc.svg)

![Image 71: Bridget Harris photo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ba882066506a1a593a0def/64be4c777b57b1f14dd40f93_bridget-quote%201.webp)

Bridget Harris

CEO and co-founder of YouCanBookMe

We tested several tools before settling on 🔵 and couldn't be happier. I didn’t like the idea that there is this bot joining my calls as a note taker, which seemed to be sneakily integrated into my calendar. With Bluedot, the experience is completely different.

Bridget Harris

CEO and co-founder of YouCanBookMe

### Frequently asked questions

#### Is Bluedot secure?

Yes, Bluedot is GDPR compliant and SOC-2 Type-2 (pending), which is the industry standard for security, reliability and privacy. We encrypt all your meeting data during transit and store it securely on AWS. You are the sole person with access to your meeting data and have the freedom to delete it at any time.

#### How is Bluedot different from other meeting recording/note taking apps?

Unlike most note-taking apps, we will not ask you to grant us access to your calendar or ask you to invite a “bot” to record your meeting. Instead, Bluedot seamlessly captures your Google Meet using our Chrome extension and immediately generates notes adapted to your needs.

#### How is it different to native Google recoding/transcription?

Bluedot offers more than just meeting recording and transcription. It helps you generate meeting notes, search across meetings, share meeting highlights, and more.  
‍  
Google Meet's native recorder has certain requirements for recording, such as being the meeting host and having the right payment plan.

#### Do you offer functionality similar to Loom?

Yes, in addition to meeting recording and note-taking features, we also offer a screen recording tool similar to Loom.

#### Do you support Zoom/MS Teams?

While our primary focus is on Google Meet, we also support the web version of Microsoft Teams and offer Zoom integration.

#### Can I record a meeting without asking for a consent?

This is entirely up to you, but we encourage you to check the consent laws in your area before recording others.
